name: dirtyantaeus
text: Memorable first date.

name: jstegall
text: One of my first faves. The last panel kicks my ass and makes me laugh every time.

name: jhunt
text: Yeah, Philippe as the voice of reason is damn funny.

name: greyfield
text: I just noticed that Philippe in the last panel has a beer belly. Adorable.

name: epicurus
text: And still not wearing a shirt. Oh Philippe, do not not wear a shirt if you ever grow up.

name: pie4me6
text: He won't grow up. Phillipe is five.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by MyrrDisparo, c_dizzle, farqussus, NDCaesar, I_Love_Kate)

name: miaou
text: The second last panel is soooo underrated... The slightest mental image of Ultra Peanut carefully adding this very sheet of toilet paper to the drawing makes me laugh for a thousand years.

name: mikerotch6
text: WHY HAVE I NEVER NOTICED THAT?!

name: rawk5tar
text: Holy crap I never noticed that. Its SO GODDAMN FUNNY

name: aliiis
text: Ultimate truth. Guys if you need me any time in the next thousand years I will be with miaou, laughing

name: snorestorm
text: It's those little details that make it so special.

name: amutepiggy
text: every time i watch the video of otters holding hands i think of them as Phillipe and Ultra Peanut

name: roastbeet
text: awesome

name: salo
text: I meant this. I do not know what is up with me and buttons today, frankly.

name: heccibiggs
text: This made me go "Awwwwwwwwwww..." more than should really be allowed.

name: i_love_kate
text: I don't doubt that the mutual tension caused by the publication of that video has since caused those otters to seperate.

name: carlyle
text: This made me go Awwwwww but in a depressed way

name: rearadmiral
text:
probably because one of the otters is now dead from leukemia.


I'm entirely serious.

name: roastbeet
text: the belly!

name: rapid_roy
text: Is she wearing a nicotine patch in the last panel?! I guess it's just a regular patch.

name: zefiel
text: Why would she wear a nicotine patch on her skirt? Clothing smart enough to eventually be addicted to the user's nicotine won't be invented until 2500, according to Lie Bot.

name: spinynorman
text: Her hair and dress are shitty because she is a shitty otter who hates babies, apparently.

name: ssddr
text: Why does her hair look wet in the last pannel? it is a mystery.

name: wharfrat
text: she just finished wrestling with the baby in the bath tub

name: deancain29
text: The funniest thing ever.

name: coconutjohn
text: i love how he signs his name with a little picture of himself

name: djwhiterabbit
text:
the chinese character that ultra peanut says in panel four (%u8A18) means 'scribe/account/narrative'.

i know very little chinese in particular, but in japanese that same character can be pronounced "shirusu" (%u8A18%u3059), meaning 'to note/to write down'.

name: zefiel
text: Up to the 7th Panel, that's how it goes every time I know a girl. The last panel is what got me into Achewood.

name: andrew_
text:
I'm glad I'm not the only one. I used to think it was weird of me to imagine stuff like that. Especially because I knew nothing about the girl upon meeting her, and had no positive or negative feelings toward her.

But I'll be damned if the first thing that popped into my head wasn't me proposing.

name: achilleselbow
text: I too often imagine marrying a girl after only the slightest assessment of her character.

name: tekende
text: Maybe this is a thing of us dudes in general.

name: xiaomimi
text: This is quite terrifying to learn!

name: i_love_kate
text:
Be terrified, Xiaomimi. Be terrified of men.

I have just now realised that your icon is Filthy Assistant II. This in itself has been enough incentive for my mind to concoct a fantasy world in which you work as a physics journalist in Sweden, while I live at home and care for our twin daughters while working on my novel.

name: i_love_kate
text: We are not married or together in any such way in this fantasy, those are just our separate stations in life.

name: i_love_kate
text: Sometimes I confuse myself, too.

name: xiaomimi
text: That sounds pretty fun.

name: i_love_kate
text: How do you feel about owning some dachshunds.

name: nutmeg
text: this reminds me of Miike's Audition. she gonna cut philippe's legs off.

name: morganization
text: shaken baby syndrome otter: cute as hell

name: featurelessvoid
text: I like the extra touches in the last panel showing Ultra Peanut's decline: patched clothes, messed-up hair, and that whole subtle laughing-at-the-dead-baby thing.

name: qingofchina
text: Instead of walking away, he entertains the idea of a broken marriage.

name: biddlebubbly
text: I like how Philippe has a little paunch in the last panel.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "That's the kind of thing I like to write."

name: tekende
text: I'm curious whether the "kind of thing he likes to write" is the strip itself, or "wipe my ass".

name: spectre
text: She just met the guy, and she already wants him to take care of her shit. So typical.

name: cuddlefish
text: he's picturing them in the future. when they have been married and have a child together. and how horribly wrong the language barrier could lead them.

name: soilentshuggah
text: Truly two epic last panels. Bravo.

name: steerpike66
text: I like the way Ultra peanut has not only inserted that off-colour command, but furnished Phillippe with a cloth with which to obey.

name: yingkaixing
text: Oh. Wow. Damn. YES.

name: d-pad
text: Tis the way of women from my experience.

name: pwb
text: heh heh what is up with urtra peanut and saying cusses

name: linnea
text: The way Onstad drew the baby on the floor is priceless. I love this strip. Hilarious.

name: lawbot
text: This strangely reflects my relationship with my fiance, except that we both both otters. We're like the transitive closure of juvenile otters. Except that my fiance's from foreign parts, and I'm not.

name: twohundredninety
text: Dude. Did she change Philippe's self-portrait to add a piece of toilet paper or something in his hand?

name: professoryes
text: Rather wrestles the "she doesn't know what she's talking about because English is not her first language" theory down, doesn't it?

name: belgand
text: It could just be the piece of paper they're writing on. We cannot rule this out.

name: lemnlime2
text: Whoa I never noticed that till now. Good eye.

name: thegrayhoodie
text: WHY ARE YOU LAUGHING?!

name: tom-ba
text: Why ARE you laughing? Laughing out LOUD?!

name: hyetal
text: Phillipe's imagination is always good.  Once he starts daydreaming he sticks it out, even to the bitter end.

name: dougthehead
text: And notice that he keeps calling her Frances, although he still doesn't know her name.

name: paperboy_2000
text: Yes.  Even when he realizes that his imaginary marriage was a big mistake, he still tires to make it work for the sake of the imaginary baby.

name: youngsoulrebel
text: This reminds me of that guy who picked out some random kanji and thought it meant "strength", but instead it said something like "underneath it all this is an ugly boy".

name: starman11
text: I think most of us have experienced moments like this, without the illusory comfort of thinking "she just doesn't understand the language."

name: niraj
text: Poor Phillipe :(

name: tslothrop
text: The baby isn't breathing?  Probably a roller skate accident in the sink.....

name: hazelfo
text: That is pretty much how my first-ever date went.

name: comrade_tom
text: Nice middle age stomach phillipe's got in the final panels thought bubble

name: kickstart
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: kickstart
text:
bah -
[IMGS OFF]

name: spinynorman
text: My God, it's like it's half kitten half puppy

name: spinynorman
text: Also does anyone else get the whole "Michael Jackson dangling his baby over a balcony" vibe from this?

name: pogo
text: Must squeeeeeeeze baby -- so cute!

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Jesus Christ that mommy otter loves its baby!

name: kikineko
text: Hehe, in the last panel, Philippe has a small jutting belly.  Even is falls apart in that dream of his.

name: kikineko
text: *Even he falls apart in his own dreams. (Sorry for my grammar, very late at night, heh.)

name: mustakrakesh
text: Wasn't this the beginning of Trainspotting?

name: carlyle
text: I didn't know what to say but I felt an overpowering need to comment this strip. It might be the last panel, Ultra Peanut's neverending grin or Philippe's little reverie but I simply must put a comment here.

name: doxfawks
text: I love Philippe so much

name: soup_alex
text: I've been dishing out a lot of 5s, but this one really deserves 5^5
